name: mispronunciation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of pronouncing a word or sound wrongly, or an example of this: Mispronunciation can be a serious obstacle to making yourself understood in a foreign language. I made a slight mispronunciation and the girl behind the counter didn't understand me. See
mispronounce
More examplesFewer examplesThank you very much for overlooking my mispronunciations. He was known for his occasional mispronunciation of medical terms.You wouldn't get upset over the mispronunciation of a word, would you?

Add to word list
Add to word list
a wrong sound used when saying a word, or the habit of pronouncing words or sounds the wrong way: [ C ] I don’t speak Russian well and when I made a slight mispronunciation, she didn’t understand me.
